select reward_seq.nextval from dual
insert into reward(reward_no, project_no, reward_amount, reward_price, reward_name, reward_intro, reward_state, reward_content) values(#{rewardNo}, #{projectNo}, #{rewardAmount}, #{rewardPrice}, #{rewardName}, #{rewardIntro}, #{rewardState}, #{rewardContent})
mapper.select: select reward_no, project_no, reward_price, reward_amount, reward_name, reward_intro, reward_state from reward where project_no = #{projectNo} order by reward_no
